title: Grocery Delivery for Elderly Residents
content:
A local charity organizes grocery deliveries for elderly residents who cannot leave their homes. The depot is the grocery store at `<loc_depot>`, and the delivery points are the residents' homes at `<locs>`.  
Each delivery van can carry up to `<capacity>` kg of groceries, and each resident’s order weighs `<demand>` kg. The vans have a fuel limit and must return to the store after driving no more than `<distance_limit>` km.  
Plan the routes to ensure all residents receive their groceries while minimizing the total distance traveled by the vans.
